app.registry.application.display.name: Display key
app.registry.role.explanation: If multiple roles (cross-cutting or in different applications) are assigned to a group, the permissions given by the roles accumulate.
app.registry.role.name: Role name
app.registry.title: Applications registry
appregistry.name: Name
rbs.booking.list.unprocessed: Reserve resources: list requests to be processed
rbs.type.create: Reserve resources: create types of resources
rbs.type.list: Reserve resources: list types of resources
support.ticket.create: Help and support: make a request
support.view: Help and support: open the module
tooltip.displayName: The key used in the translation files for the name of the application
tooltip.icon:
You can use an image from a website (in the form of http(s)://[link-to-image]).
This image can be taken from your document space if it is in "document added to my apps".
Right click, then select "copy the address of the image".
tooltip.name: Application name
tooltip.password: OAuth secret code for communicating with Core VLE
tooltip.target:
How the link will be displayed in the VLE:
"Page" opens the app in the same page.
"New page" opens the app in a new window.
"Iframe" will open the app in an iframe.
tooltip.transferSession: Transmit the current user's session to the application
wiki.print: Lecture and Wiki: print the courses
wiki.view: Lecture and Wiki: access the service
workspace.document.list.folders: Filespace: display folders in the Filespace
workspace.documents.list.by.folder: Filespace: display files in a folder
workspace.rack.available.users: Filespace: display available users for the rack
workspace.rack.document.add: Filespace: place a file in a user's rack
workspace.rack.document.delete: Filespace: permanently delete a file from the rack
workspace.rack.document.get: Filespace: download a file from the rack
workspace.rack.document.move.trash: Filespace: move a file from the rack to trash
workspace.rack.documents.copy: Filespace: copy a file from the rack
workspace.rack.list.documents: Filespace: display files in the rack
workspace.rack.list.trash.documents: Filespace: display files from the rack in the trash
workspace.rack.restore: Filespace: restore file from trash to the rack
appregistry.app.is.applocked: This application is managed by the webpage service. Please contact the author regarding any changes.
appregistry.app.is.not.scopeable: You do not have the right to modify this connector's settings because it is shared with other schools.
appregistry.confirm.app.deletion: Please confirm the permanent removal of the application
appregistry.connector.opts.header:
The connector settings allow you to share the user authentication with another site so that the user will not need to be reauthenticated.

This type of link is only possible with certain websites. Check with the support section of this website or the VLE help service to find out the settings to change.
appregistry.external.app.header: This link/connector will only be visible for members of the groups selected on the "Permissions tab".
appregistry.external.apps.list.header: List of connectors and links available for this structure.
appregistry.failed.app:
Error during the creation or modification of the application.
Another application may have the same name.
appregistry.failed.app.url:
Error during the creation or modification of the application.
The URL is invalid.
appregistry.groups.attribution.header: Below please choose the user groups that will be able to access the application and see it appear in "my applications."
appregistry.groups.massAttribution.heade: Mass attribution allows for the granting of permission for the application or widget across all of the profile groups of the underlying structures.
appregistry.inherits: Share the application with the sub-structures
appregistry.mass.unlink.notify.ko: Error during the withdrawal of permissions
appregistry.widget.i18n: Relative path to the folder containing the translation files
appregistry.widget.js: Relative path to the javascript file
appregistry.widget.linked.to.app: The widget is linked to the application
appregistry.widget.name: Widget name
appregistry.widget.path: Relative path to the template file
appregistry.widget.tooltip.i18n: Folder containing a translation file in json format by language
appregistry.widget.tooltip.js: The javascript file contains the widget logic
appregistry.widget.tooltip.lock: Pin the widget and make it mandatory on the homepage
appregistry.widget.tooltip.name: Technical widget name, must be unique
appregistry.widget.tooltip.path: The HTML file contains widget graphics
appregistry.widget.workflow.linked: Users must also have permissions for this application to see the Widget.
appregistry.widgets.attribution.header: Below please choose the groups whose users will be able to see the widget on the homepage.
order.linked.groups: Show groups with access at the top of the list
show.linked.groups: Only show the groups that have access to the application
support.ticket.escalate: Help and support: flag a ticket
tooltip.cas.pattern:
Regular expression that approves the URL of the CAS client (the one that calls the VLE CAS server).
This field is optional, by default, the domain of the URL entered above is used.
tooltip.cas.server.type: Specifies the response and therefore the fields sent back to the CAS client when they call the path/serviceValidate.
tooltip.inherits: Defines whether the application can be seen, assigned and modified by the administrators of the underlying structures.
tooltip.scope: All functions that can be used. The OAuth authentication allows the OAuth client to use the functions contained in the scope.
